skills.name: EXTRACT
desc: • Deals high magic damage to a target.
• 35% Chance to Silence enemies for 1 turn.

skills.name: DETONATE
desc: • Deals magic damage to a single target.
• Freeze Stuns the target and inflicts Magic Burn.

skills.name: EXPLODE
desc: Explodes upon death, dealing true damage to all enemies based on the [32CD32]MAX HP[-] of you and the enemy.
